title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

hero_venue.venue_name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art (Metropolitan Museum of Art)

tips.tip: You probably need two days (or lots of dedication and an early start) to see the Met in its entirety. Go in and grab a map to make your game plan ahead of time if you can. I loved the American wing!
